content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- Query parquet file.
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

--Check data type
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/**'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]';

--Assign data type
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result];
--6mb data is scanned
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
WITH (
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    trip_type INT
) AS [result];
--1 mb data is scanned

--Check datatype now.
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/**'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) 
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result]';

/*
Assignment
---------
1) Query from folders using wildcard characters
2) Use filename() function
3) Query from subfolders
4) Use filepath() to select only certain partitions
*/
--1 Query from folders using wildcard characters
SELECT 
    *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
) AS Pdata

--2 Use filename() function
SELECT 
    Pdata.*,
    Pdata.filename()
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
) AS Pdata
ORDER BY Pdata.filename()

--3 Query from subfolders
SELECT 
    *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
) AS Pdata

--4 Use filepath() to select only certain partitions
SELECT 
    Pdata.filepath(1) AS year,
    Pdata.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(*) AS total
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
) AS Pdata
WHERE Pdata.filepath(1) = '2020'
AND Pdata.filepath(2) IN ('07','08','09')
GROUP BY Pdata.filepath(1), Pdata.filepath(2)
ORDER BY Pdata.filepath(1), Pdata.filepath(2)
